promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive basic scorpion grass-type pokemon with green runic wings. It can be found in woods-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or scorpion. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Sylvathorn, a a massive basic scorpion grass-type pokemon. It can be found in woods-like environments It has the following abilities: Special Reaction. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "scorpion", "grass" or "Sylvathorn". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, scorpion-like, basic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, emerald bokeh lighting
generatedDescription: Nesting in dense forests, the colossal Sylvathorn evokes awe with its leafy armor and thorny tail. It flourishes by ensnaring prey using its Special Reaction prowess.
